name: Blowing Up - VimJam3
description:
This is a game I made for VimJam3. It's also the first game that I have finished.  It's a simple endless platformer where you use a rocket launcher to launch yourself from platform to platform and also to break blocks. You have to avoid the rising fire and go for a high score. It's not perfect, but I am pretty happy with it considering this is both my first time participating in a game jam and my first time making a finished product with unity.

Controls: 

A&D -- Move Left & Right 

Space -- Jump

LMB -- Shoot Rocket 

How To Play: Shoot rockets at your feet to launch yourself upward to reach other platforms. Shoot blocks that are in your way. Try to see how far you can get without touching the rising fire.
